languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Когда-то я был приставлен к тебе, чтобы искать в твоих деяниях и словах крупицы ереси... а теперь ты показываешь мне, как быть подлинным имперцем. Хорошо. Мы найдем способ".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Когда-то я был приставлен к тебе, чтобы искать в твоих деяниях и словах крупицы ереси... а теперь ты показываешь мне, как быть подлинным имперцем. Хорошо. Мы найдем способ".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс молчит несколько секунд.{/n} "Когда-то я был приставлен к тебе, чтобы искать в твоих деяниях и словах крупицы ереси... а теперь ты показываешь мне, как быть подлинным имперцем. Хорошо. Мы найдем способ".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

{n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

{n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

{n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“之前，我奉命调查你的活动与言论，试图找出任何异端言说的蛛丝马迹……而现在，你让我看到了真正帝国公民的典范。我们一定能找到办法。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“之前，我奉命调查你的活动与言论，试图找出任何异端言说的蛛丝马迹……而现在，你让我看到了真正帝国公民的典范。我们一定能找到办法。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio unos segundos.{/n} «Me asignaron que investigara sus palabras y sus acciones en busca de herejía... y aquí está, enseñándome a ser un ciudadano modélico del Imperium. Encontraremos la forma».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio unos segundos.{/n} «Me asignaron que investigara sus palabras y sus acciones en busca de herejía... y aquí está, enseñándome a ser un ciudadano modélico del Imperium. Encontraremos la forma».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは数秒間沈黙する。{/n}「俺は異端の痕跡を見つけるため、あなたの活動や発言を調査するよう命じられた…そして今、あなたは帝国の真の市民になる方法を教えてくれている。必ず道を探そう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは数秒間沈黙する。{/n}「俺は異端の痕跡を見つけるため、あなたの活動や発言を調査するよう命じられた…そして今、あなたは帝国の真の市民になる方法を教えてくれている。必ず道を探そう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reste silencieux pendant quelques secondes.{/n} « On m'a chargé de surveiller vos activités et déclarations pour y déceler toute trace d'hérésie... mais vous, vous me montrez comment être un véritable citoyen de l'Imperium. Nous trouverons une solution. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reste silencieux pendant quelques secondes.{/n} « On m'a chargé de surveiller vos activités et déclarations pour y déceler toute trace d'hérésie... mais vous, vous me montrez comment être un véritable citoyen de l'Imperium. Nous trouverons une solution. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schweigt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Ich hatte den Auftrag, Eure Aktivitäten und Aussagen zu überprüfen, um mögliche Ketzerei aufzuspüren ... dabei zeigt Ihr mir gerade, wie man sich als echter Bürger des Imperiums verhalten sollte. Wir werden einen Weg finden."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schweigt einige Sekunden.{/n} Ich hatte den Auftrag, Eure Aktivitäten und Aussagen zu überprüfen, um mögliche Ketzerei aufzuspüren ... dabei zeigt Ihr mir gerade, wie man sich als echter Bürger des Imperiums verhalten sollte. Wir werden einen Weg finden."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, birkaç saniyeliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Kâfirlik emareleri bulmaya çalışayım diye eylemlerini ve beyanlarını incelemeye atanmıştım... Şimdiyse sen, İmparatorluk'un nasıl gerçek bir yurttaşı olunacağını bana gösteriyorsun. Bir yolunu bulacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is silent for a few seconds.{/n} "I was assigned to look into your activities and statements to try to find traces of heresy... and now you are showing me how to be a true citizen of the Imperium. We will find a way."
